game.name: Born to Burn: Ash and Flesh - A Tale from Surrealidade
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Born to Burn: Ash and Flesh is a surreal, experimental indie game that blends psychological horror, platforming, and exploration as players control an evolving creature through diverse gameplay styles and metaphysical challenges.
